entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Antigonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: SE 16 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain after midnight and ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
